title: Prof González evaluating new method note taking

content.question: Professor González is a researcher who studies memory encoding. They are interested in evaluating the ability of a new method of note-taking to improve student grades. Group A is trained in the new method and group B uses the traditional outline method of taking notes. What is Professor González’ independent variable?

choices.label: The number of students per group

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
